heading: HB01019
0: AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10086 ENTITLED "AN ACT STRENGTHENING PEOPLES' NATIONALISM THROUGH PHILIPPINE HISTORY BY CHANGING THE NOMENCLATURE OF THE NATIONAL HISTORICAL INSTITUTE INTO THE NATIONAL HISTORICAL COMMISSION OF THE PHILIPPINES, STRENGTHENING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTION, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES"
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01019
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10086 ENTITLED "AN ACT STRENGTHENING PEOPLES' NATIONALISM THROUGH PHILIPPINE HISTORY BY CHANGING THE NOMENCLATURE OF THE NATIONAL HISTORICAL INSTITUTE INTO THE NATIONAL HISTORICAL COMMISSION OF THE PHILIPPINES, STRENGTHENING ITS POWERS AND FUNCTION, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES"
ABSTRACT : Removes the One Million (P1,000,000.00) Peso cap on the revolving fund of the National Historical Commission of the Philippine (NHCP) and the provision requiring the return of excess income to the national treasury.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BATAOIL, LEOPOLDO N.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Catamco (010 2016-08-15)2. Alejano (095 2017-05-29)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-10-26
          -NHCP
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2016-08-01
